text: Ballad of Siberia () is a 1948 Soviet musical movie directed by Ivan Pyryev.Сказание о земле Сибирской (1947)Что не пропустить по ТВ и в Сети на неделе с 27 апреля по 3 мая It stars Vladimir Druzhnikov, Marina Ladynina, and Boris Andreyev. ==Actors== * Vladimir Druzhnikov as Andrei Nikolayevich Balashov * Marina Ladynina as Natasha Pavlovna Malinina * Boris Andreyev as Yakov Zakharonovich Burmak * Vera Vasileva as Nastenka Petrovna Gusenkova * Sergei Kalinin as Kornei Nefedovich Zavorin * Yelena Savitskaya as Kapitolina Kondratyevna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1948 musical movies Category:Soviet musical movies Category:Movies set in Russia Category:Movies directed by Ivan Pyryev
title: Ballad of Siberia
